# Gene set enrichment

## OR vs R 

```{r}
dotplot(Gene_set_diff_analysis[["OR_vs_R"]], showCategory=10, split=".sign") + facet_grid(.~.sign)
```

## OR vs R (no RUNX1m)

```{r}

```


## NR vs R

```{r}

```



## NR vs R (without RUNX1m)

